description:
ProxAllium is a GUI frontend to Tor. You can use it to easily create a proxy and use with it programs (like browsers, mail clients, chat clients etc.) to circumvent censorship and also to encrypt your connection.

**_Requires Tor to function, you can get it from the `tor` or `tor-browser` bundle packages._**
      
**Please note: The package may be flagged by VirusTotal as malicious.** This application uses AutoIt scripting, which malicious parties have used in the past, and as a result some Vendors flag software built from AutoIt as a Trojan or Malware. *You can view the software [source code](https://github.com/DcodingTheWeb/ProxAllium/) and VirusTotal detection details and draw your own conclusions as to the validity of the results.* For more information please refer to the following links:  
[Comment by the Developer](https://github.com/chocolatey-community/chocolatey-package-requests/issues/1062#issuecomment-919046172) | [AutoIt and Malware](https://www.autoitscript.com/wiki/AutoIt_and_Malware) | [Are my AutoIt EXEs really infected?](https://www.autoitscript.com/forum/topic/34658-are-my-autoit-exes-really-infected/)
author: Damon Harris
